```{r}
library(snowfall)
library(raster)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
imagery_path<-"DATA/SanMiguel_West/Tiffs/SM_GypsumGapNW_0103_180611.tif"
r<-brick(imagery_path)

r2<-r*2

l<-list(r[[1]], r2[[1]])
```

```{r}
rasterOptions(
  maxmemory = 5e+10
)
start<-Sys.time()
l2<-lapply(l, scale)
Sys.time()-start

```
Took about 45 Seconds
